author: pburba
msg: Implement svn:mergeinfo elision for svn merge, update, and switch.
(svn_client__elide_mergeinfo): New.  Elides mergeinfo on a target WC
path to its nearest ancestor with equivalent mergeinfo.
(get_wc_merge_info): Add arguments to restrict how far up the WC to look
for inherited mergeinfo and whether to look *only* for inherited mergeinfo.
Add reference argument to record the path walked to find inherited info.
(mergeinfo_elides): New. A wrapper around svn_mergeinfo__equals() that
understands mergeinfo equivalence rather than absolute equality.
(elide_children): New. Iterate through array of target path's children
with mergeinfo and elide only the path's immediate children.
(do_merge, do_single_file_merge): Elide merge target's descendants as
immediate children with mergeinfo to the target.
Upon completion of switch/update perform post-order traversal of target's
children with mergeinfo, checking each for elidability and finally eliding
status and properties to account for svn:mergeinfo elision.
